productName: KStrong® Handy Line™ 60 ft. Adjustable 2-Person Capacity Temporary Horizontal Lifeline System (ANSI)
shortDescription: The KStrong® Handy Line™ 60 ft. Adjustable Temporary Horizontal Lifeline System is designed for simultaneous use by up to two workers, offering a reliable and portable safety solution. This system features a durable polymer housing, galvanized steel wire rope, and an inbuilt shock absorption mechanism to limit impact forces during falls. Easy to install, remove, and store, it includes a tension indicator for precise setup and a molded handle for convenient transport. Compliant with ANSI standards, this lifeline system is ideal for various job sites, making working at height safer.
